item.title: Linux Kernel Setup for debugging
item.description: Table of Contents Introduction Steps Conclusion Introduction This post is about setting up Linux Kernel for debugging. Steps Build a kernel Build an image Launch virtual machine Attach and setup debugger Build, load and debug a test module Build a kernel Download a kernel wget https://cdn.kernel.org/pub/linux/kernel/v5.x/linux-5.9.7.tar.xz Extract tar -xf linux-5.9.7.tar.xz Build an image Launch virtual machine Attach and setup debugger Build, load and debug a test module Conclusion

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Table of Contents Introduction Contact Introduction My name is Dhriti Shikhar. I am a computer programmer. This blog is a collection of some of my learnings.
